title: Survey on regretting tattoos in the U.S. 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response No has the highest Share of respondents and Yes has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 54.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 77.0 is found at Response No and the minimum is found at Yes where Response is 23.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response No has the highest Share of respondents and Yes has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 54.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response No and lowest at Response Yes.
Response No has 3.35 times more Share of respondents than Response Yes which is has the lowest.
The Response No has 1.54 times more Share of respondents than average.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 100.0.
